maqras.text: 94|1|(he nabee!) kya hamane tumhaare lie tumhaara vaksh (seena) nahin khol diya
94|2|aur tumhaara bojh nahin utaar diya
94|3|jisane tumhaaree peeth tod dee thee.
94|4|aur tumhaaree charcha ko ooncha kar diya.
94|5|nishchay kathinaee ke saath aasaanee bhee hai.
94|6|nishchay kathinaee ke saath aasaanee bhee hai.
94|7|atah, jab avasar mile, jo aaraadhana mein prayaas karo.
94|8|aur apane paalanahaar kee or dhyaanamagn ho jao.
95|1|injeer tatha zaitoon kee shapath
95|2|evan "toore seeneen" kee shapath
95|3|aur is shaanti ke nagar kee shapath
95|4|hamane inasaan ko manohar roop mein paida kiya hai.
95|5|phir use sabase neeche gira diya.
95|6|parantu, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, unake lie aisa badala hai, jo kabhee samaapt nahin hoga.
95|7|phir (tum maanav jaati) pratiphal (badale) ke din ko kyon jhuthalaate ho
95|8|kya allaah sab adhikaariyon se badh kar adhikaaree nahin hai
96|1|apane paalanahaar ke naam se padh, jisane paida kiya.
96|2|jis ne manushy ko rakt ko lothade se paida kiya.
96|3|padh, aur tera paalanahaar bada daya vaala hai.
96|4|jis ne lekhanee ke dvaara gyaan sikhaaya.
96|5|insaan ko usaka gyaan diya jis ko vah nahin jaanata tha.
96|6|vaastav mein, insaan sarakashee karata hai.
96|7|isalie ki vah svayan ko nishchint (dhanavaan) samajhata hai.
96|8|nihsandeh, phir tere paalanahaar kee or palat kar jaana hai.
96|9|kya tumane use dekha jo rokata hai.
96|10|ek bhakt ko, jab vah namaaz ada kare.
96|11|bhala dekho to, yadi vah seedhe maarg par ho.
96|12|ya allaah se darane ka aadesh deta ho
96|13|aur dekho to, yadi usane jhuthalaaya tatha munh phera ho
96|14|kya vah nahin jaanata ki allaah use dekh raha hai
96|15|nishchay yadi vah nahin rukata, to ham use maathe ke bal ghasetenge.
96|16|jhoothe aur paapee maathe ke bal.
96|17|to vah apanee sabha ko bula le.
96|18|ham bhee narak ke farishton ko bulaayenge.
96|19|(he bhakt) kadaapi usakee baat na suno tatha sajda karo aur mere sameep ho jao.
97|1|nihsandeh, hamane us (quraan) ko lailatul qadr (sammaanit raatri) mein utaara.
97|2|aur tum kya jaano ki vah lailatul qadr (sammaanit raatri) kya hai
97|3|lailatul qadr (sammaanit raatri) hazaar maas se uttam hai.
97|4|usamen (har kaam ko poorn karane ke lie) farishte tatha roohî€¼ (jibreel) apane paalanahaar kee aagya se utarate hain.
97|5|vah shaanti kee raatri hai, jo bhor hone tak rahatee hai.
98|1|ahle kitaab ke kaafir aur mushrik log eemaan laane vaale nahin the jab tak ki unake paas khula pramaam na aa jaaye.
98|2|arthaat allaah ka ek rasool, jo pavitr granth padhakar sunaaye.
98|3|jisamen uchit aadesh hai.
98|4|aur jin logon ko granth diye gaye, unhonne is khule pramaan ke aa jaane ke pashchaat hee matabhed kiya.
98|5|aur unhen keval yahee aadesh diya gaya tha ki ve dharm ko shudhd rakhen aur sabako taj kar keval allaah kee upaasana karen, namaaz ada karen aur zakaat den aur yahee shaasht dharm hai.
98|6|nihsandeh, jo log ahle kitaab mein se kaafir ho gaye tatha mushrik (mishranavaadee), to ve sada narak kee aag mein rahenge aur vahee dushtatam jan hain.
98|7|jo log eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar karate rahe, to vahee sarvashreshth jan hain.

98|8|unaka pratiphal unake paalanahaar kee or se sada rahane vaale baag hain. jinake neeche naharen bahatee hongee. ve unamen sada nivaas karenge. allaah unase prasann hua aur ve allaah se prasann hue. ye usake lie hai, jo apane paalanahaar se dara.
99|1|jab dharatee ko pooree tarah jhanjhod diya jaayega.
99|2|tatha bhoomi apane bojh baahar nikaal degee.
99|3|aur insaan kahega ki ise kya ho gaya
99|4|us din vah apanee sabhee soochanaayen varnan kar degee.
99|5|kyonki tere paalanahaar ne use yahee aadesh diya hai.
99|6|us din log titar-bitar hokar aayenge, taaki ve apane karmon ko dekh len.
99|7|to jisane ek kan ke baraabar bhee puny kiya hoga, use dekh lega.
99|8|aur jisane ek kan ke baraabar bhee bura kiya hoga, use dekh lega.
100|1|un ghodon kee shapath, jo daudakar haanph jaate hain
100|2|phir pattharon par taap maarakar chingaariyaan nikaalane vaalon kee shapath
100|3|phir praatah kaal mein dhaava bolane vaalon kee shapath
100|4|jo dhool udaate hain.
100|5|phir sena ke beech ghus jaate hain.
100|6|vaastav mein, insaan apane paalanahaar ka bada krtaghn (naashukara) hai.
100|7|nishchit roop se, vah isapar svayan saakshee (gavaah) hai.
100|8|vah dhan ka bada premee hai.
